title.rendered: Apple EarPods with Lightning Connector – White

content.rendered:
Designed by Apple
Deeper, richer bass tones
Greater safety from sweat and water
Control music and video playback
Answer and finish calls
Works with all gadgets which have a Lightning connector and assist iOS 10 or later, together with iPod contact, iPad and iPhone.
